entry.title: Welcome to my blog
entry.content:
Welcome to my new blog

In this blog, I will try to log my experiments on web develoment, atoum, Behat, Backbone or Pomm.

In the next weeks, I intend to install an Elasticsearch/Logstash/Kibana stack to store application logs for my Symfony2 apps. I want to try to make beautiful frontend with BackboneJS to work with a Symfony2 Rest backend, unit tested with atoum and functional with Behat.

I will try to replace Propel1 Orm on my projects by Pomm

2015 will be an interesting year!
